name: Belief Color
description:
Let’s contest who can obtain more belief! The goddesses of light and dark want to spread their faith in the world, and to dye the "color" of their faith in the places they walk. Who will win the final victory?

It’s a cute pixel-art multiply game. Getting score points by dyeing the floor, the player who scores more points in a fixed time will win the game! The game has different levels of maps to choose from!

Game operation:

PL1:  Move:  → & ←

Jump: ↑

Bomb: ↓ (need to collect)

PL2:  Move:  A & D

Jump: W

Bomb: S
